short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn a second language by picking up new vocabulary in news articles. Answer MCQ questions based on your learning history.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pick up new vocabulary in Chinese. 
This replaces some words in each news article with their translations. You can listen to the words' pronunciations in Mandarin, and view a dictionary entry to learn more.

After using this for a few times, MCQ quizzes will be given to validate the your recognition of the word.
